text: Rainer Werner Fassbinder (; 31 May 1945 – 10 June 1982) was a German stage and movie director, movie producer, screenwriter, and stage and movie actor. He is one of the most important figures in the New German Cinema. He was born in Bad Wörishofen, Bavaria, Germany. Fassbinder was bisexual. He died at the age of 37 from a heart attack caused by a lethal cocktail of cocaine and barbiturates in Munich, Germany. ==Other websites== * Fassbinder Foundation * Category:1945 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Actors from Bavaria Category:Bisexual people Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Drug-related accidental deaths Category:Extras Category:German LGBT people Category:German movie actors Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:German stage actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT directors Category:LGBT producers Category:LGBT screenwriters Category:Writers from Bavaria
title: Rainer Werner Fassbinder
